title: BRIEF-Razor Energy Corp Announces Resignation Of Stan Smith From Board Of Directors, Effective Immediately
text:
BRIEF-Razor Energy Corp Announces Resignation Of Stan Smith From Board Of Directors, Effective Immediately

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 19:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Razor Energy Corp Announces Resignation Of Stan Smith From Board Of Directors, Effective Immediately Sept 20 (Reuters) - Razor Energy Corp : * . ANNOUNCES DIRECTOR RESIGNATION * ANNOUNCES RESIGNATION OF STAN SMITH FROM COMPANY'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS, EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY

BRIEF-Razor Energy Corp Announces Resignation Of Stan Smith From Board Of Directors, Effective Immediately
